snippet: The European Banking Authority said lenders had strengthened their capital positions after reviews last year.
abstract: DealBook Online; European Banking Authority announces it will conduct next round of stress tests in 2016 rather than in 2015, giving Continent's banks another year to prepare; decision reflects acknowledgement that lenders have strengthened their capital positions in response to last round of tests.
lead_paragraph: The European Banking Authority said lenders had strengthened their capital positions after reviews last year.

headline.main: European Banking Regulator Postpones Next Stress Tests to 2016
